dct_title_s: Deliniantur in hac tabula, orae maritimae Abexiæ, freti Mecani ; al. Maris Rubri ; Arabiæ, Ormi, Persiæ, suprà sindam usque fluminis Indi, cambaiæ Indiæ & Malabaris, Insulae, Ceylon, Choromandeliæ, & Orixæ, fluvii Gangis, & Regni Bengalæ, situs item sinuum, insularum... =
dct_alternative_sm: Afbeeldinge der custen van Abex, der engte van Mecha, anders ghenaempt de Roode Zee, item de custen van Arabien, Ormus, Persen tot sinde toe
dct_description_sm: [Jan Huygen van Linschoten ; Henricus F. ab Langren].
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
2 bar scales on map given in "Miliaria germanica" and "Hispanicae leucae".
Illustrations of a compass rose, sea creatures, ships, and fauna throughout.
Shows topography, drainage, islands off the coast, boundaries, places of historical interest.
Title in Latin and Dutch; place names in Latin and Dutch.
From Linschoten's Itinerario, voyage ofte schipvaert van Jan Huygen van Linschoten naer Oost ofte Portugaels Indien.
dct_creator_sm: Langren, Henricus F. ab (Henricus Florentius), approximately 1574-1648
